央.definition: center; end; to beg; to plead

央中.definition: to ask for mediation; to request sb to act as a go-between

央人.definition: to ask sb (to do sth); to entreat

央企.definition: centrally-managed state-owned enterprise (PRC), abbr. for 中央企業|中央企业[zhong1 yang1 qi3 ye4]

央及.definition: to ask; to plead; to beg; to involve

央告.definition: to implore; to plead; to ask earnestly

央求.definition: to implore; to plead; to ask earnestly

央行.definition: central bank (abbr. for 中央銀行|中央银行[zhong1yang1 yin2hang2])

央視.definition: China Central Television (CCTV), abbr. for 中國中央電視台|中国中央电视台[Zhong1 guo2 Zhong1 yang1 Dian4 shi4 tai2]

央託.definition: to request assistance; to ask sb to do sth

央財.definition: Central University of Finance and Economics, Beijing; abbr. for 中央財經大學|中央财经大学[Zhong1 yang1 Cai2 jing1 Da4 xue2]
